original_text: And thou shalt make the seven lamps thereof: and they shall light the lamps thereof, that they may give light over against it.
korean_text: 등잔 일곱을 만들어 그 위에 두어 앞을 비추게 하며

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt make the seven lamps thereof:
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것의 일곱 등불을 만들어야 할 것이다:

sentences.original_text: and they shall light the lamps thereof,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그것의 등불을 켤 것이며,

sentences.original_text: that they may give light over against it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 맞은편에 빛을 비출 수 있도록.
